name: json-server
description: ``` sudo npm install -g json-server ``` ## json file ```js // db.json {   "posts": [     { "id": 1, "title": "json-server", "author": "typicode" }   ],   "comments": [     { "id": 1, "body": "some comment", "postId": 1 }   ],   "profile": { "name": "typicode" } } // run json-server --watch db.json ``` ## js file ``` npm init -y npm i fake ```
